panels.description:
node_disk_io_time_seconds_total：
The number of milliseconds the disk spends on input/output operations. This value is the accumulated value.（Milliseconds Spent Doing I/Os）

irate(node_disk_io_time_seconds_total[1m])：
Calculate the rate per second: (last value - last previous value) / timestamp difference, that is, the percentage of time that the disk spends on I/O operations in 1 second.

matcher.options: Idle - Waiting for something to happen
md0_% of I/O operations per second
md1_% of I/O operations per second
md2_% of I/O operations per second
md3_% of I/O operations per second
nvme0n1_% of I/O operations per second
nvme1n1_% of I/O operations per second
nvme2n1_% of I/O operations per second

panels.title: CPU usage, disk I/O operations per second take time（%）

panels.description:
Reads completed: Reads per second per disk partition

Writes completed: Number of writes per second per disk partition

IO now Number of input/output requests being processed per disk partition per second
panels.title: Disk read and write rate（IOPS）

panels.description:
Read bytes The number of bits read per second per disk partition
Written bytes The number of bits written per second per disk partition
panels.title: Disk read and write capacity

panels.description:
Read time ms Number of seconds per disk partition read operation

Write time ms Number of seconds spent per disk partition write operation

IO time ms Number of seconds spent per disk partition input/output operation

 IO time weighted Weighted seconds spent per disk partition input/output operation
panels.title: Disk IO read and write time

panels.description:
CurrEstab - TCP connections with current state ESTABLISHED or CLOSE-WAIT

ActiveOpens - TCP average connections that have been converted from CLOSED state to SYN-SENT state (within 1 minute)

PassiveOpens - Directly from LISTEN state The average number of TCP connections to SYN-RCVD state (within 1 minute)

TCP_all oc - the number of TCP sockets allocated (established, applied to sk_buff)

TCP_inuse - in use (listening The number of TCP sockets 

TCP_tw - the number of TCP connections waiting to be closed
panels.title: TCP Connection situation
